select B.goods_cd as codeCd, B.goods_nm as codeNm from public."TB_ERP_USER000" A ,public."TB_ERP_GOODS000" B where A.user_cd = B.UPDATED_BY
select a.sub_code as codeCd , a.sub_name as codeNm from public."TB_ERP_CODE100_BACKUP" a where a.main_code = 'PAYMENT_YN'
select a.sub_code as codeCd, a.sub_name as codeNm from public."TB_ERP_CODE100_BACKUP" a where a.main_code = 'ONLINE_SERVICE_STATUS'
